00010 /*
00011 * This template class GenricContainer can be used to contain object of any type.
00012 * GenricContainer itself derives from class GenericObject and one of it's
00013 * usage can be to contain objects which are not GenericObject and they
00014 * need to be set into DataItem.
00015 */
00016
